questions.question_text: Which of the following is the BEST control to mitigate the impact of credential harvesting attacks?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Least privilege access control principle ensures users only have access to the data they need, it does not dynamically mask data or provide subset views based on conditions. Context-aware access control dynamically adjusts access permissions and provides users with subset views of data based on specific conditions, such as user roles, location, or purpose. In data warehousing, this model can mask sensitive data while allowing authorized users to access only the necessary information.

Selected Answer: A
Subset view = A. Least privilege access control

questions.question_text: Which data warehousing operating model masks data within a larger database to provide subset views to users?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
These laws typically require verifiable parental or guardian consent before processing the personal data of children.

choices.A: Requiring children to obtain permission from parents or guardians before using the application
choices.C: Verifying the approval of parents or guardians before processing personal data of children
choices.B: Using clear and consistent terminology in the terms of use and privacy notices
choices.D: Verifying the date of birth for users who may be legally considered as minors

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the PRIMARY consideration when managing consent for the use of an application targeted toward children?
What type of personal information can be collected by a mobile application without consent?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct. Everything else is PII.

Selected Answer: D
Shall be D!!!

questions.question_text: An online business has implemented cookies in its retail website to track customer shopping behavior. Which of the following is the MOST important process to ensure customersâ€™ privacy rights are not compromised?

choices.B: Updating the privacy risk profile to include the use of cookies
choices.D: Designing metrics to monitor performance of cookies
choices.A: Removing tracked customer data from the website
choices.C: Obtaining customer consent to accept cookies

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
this is what we have to do these days while browsing
